search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | stats values(businessGroup) as bg by businessGroup

chart.title: Anypoint MQ - Sandbox - Queues Transactions - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(mqMetrics.stats.summary.sandbox.queues.messagesSent) as sent, values(mqMetrics.stats.summary.sandbox.queues.messagesAck) as ack, values(mqMetrics.stats.summary.sandbox.queues.messagesInFlight) as inFlight, values(mqMetrics.stats.summary.sandbox.queues.messagesReceived) as received | stats max(sent) as "Messages Sent", max(ack) as "Ack", max(inFlight) as "In Flight", max(received) as "Received" | transpose
